name: Bangalore Ultimate: Beginners Ultimate Frisbee 101
description: A beginner-friendly plunge into ultimate frisbee—this session fuses speed, strategy, and camaraderie for a dynamic, high-energy game that’s as social as it is athletic

name: Slurp Masterclass
description: Master the art of biryani at Slurp Culinary Academy in a 4-hour deep dive — learn how to make Dakhni Gosht, Kachi Murgh & Subz Navaratan styles of biryanis from scratch. Plus classic sides, all while cooking (and eating) your way through tradition

name: Electric India Tour

location.name: Fandom at Gilly's Redefined, Koramanagla
location.address: Fandom at Gilly's Redefined, Koramanagla Bangalore

description: AmytDattaElectricPowerQuartet brings their Electric India tour to Fandom, debuting a new album with surprises in tow—backed by Bohemian Ent, Only Indie India & an electrified fanbase

name: Saturday Night Fever (1977)
description: John Travolta struts through 'Saturday Night Fever (1977)'—a disco classic screening paired with Bee Gees anthems and a nostalgic menu by Chef Rhea Aaron

name: Equus
description: Playhouse reimagines Equus as shadow theatre—exploring obsession, violence, and the psyche’s darkest corners in this psychological drama rooted in primal myth and raw desire

name: Echoes of the Opera
description: The Chronic Blues Circus takes the stage at Hamilton Whitefield for Echoes of the Opera—a one-night fusion of operatic drama and blues grit, with covers and originals steeped in soul

name: Physique 57 X Bastian Garden City

location.name: Bastian Garden City, St. Mark's Rd
location.address: Bastian Garden City, St. Mark's Rd Bangalore

description: At Bastian Garden City, Physique 57 brings a circuit-style workout to a luxe setting—mixing full-body strength training with post-burn bites and wellness-forward flair
